Instance.description: The Breaking and Entering Situation. This situation represents a sim visiting an NPC's home specifically when they are away. It consists of the player, the Sims they invite, and at the end the LotOwners or Renters of the household they're visiting. This also spins up a particular zone director at the current lot.

Tunable.name: _zone_director
Tunable.description: This zone director will automatically be requested by the situation during zone spin up.

Tunable.name: post_breakin_role
Tunable.description: The role state the player Sims who travelled here have once the door is open.

TunableTuple.name: pre_breakin_player_group_job_and_role_state
TunableTuple.display: Pre Breakin Player Group Job And Role State
TunableTuple.description: The job and role state of the Sims who travelled here to B&E.

Tunable.name: role_state
Tunable.description: A role state the sim assigned to the job will perform

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that can be performed at this Situation.
